main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a pale yellow object flying in the sky over Rockford, Illinois on April 9, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 2500 feet., The object was described as round and pale yellow in color., The observation was made around 21:00 with clear skies and visibility of 15 miles., The object flew from the northwest to the east., There are references to reports from reliable airline pilots regarding flying saucers.
